name: CreativeWorkSeason
description: A media season e.g. tv, radio, video game etc.
title: CreativeWorkSeason

fields.name: actor
fields.title: actor
fields.description: An actor, e.g. in tv, radio, movie, video games etc., or in an event. Actors can be associated with individual items or with a series, episode, clip.

fields.name: partOfSeries
fields.title: partOfSeries
fields.description: The series to which this episode or season belongs.

fields.name: numberOfEpisodes
fields.title: numberOfEpisodes
fields.description: The number of episodes in this season or series.

fields.name: trailer
fields.title: trailer
fields.description: The trailer of a movie or tv/radio series, season, episode, etc.

fields.name: endDate
fields.title: endDate
fields.description: The end date and time of the item (in ISO 8601 date format).

fields.name: startDate
fields.title: startDate
fields.description: The start date and time of the item (in ISO 8601 date format).

fields.name: director
fields.title: director
fields.description: A director of e.g. tv, radio, movie, video gaming etc. content, or of an event. Directors can be associated with individual items or with a series, episode, clip.

fields.name: productionCompany
fields.title: productionCompany
fields.description: The production company or studio responsible for the item e.g. series, video game, episode etc.

fields.name: episode
fields.title: episode
fields.description: An episode of a tv, radio or game media within a series or season.

fields.name: seasonNumber
fields.title: seasonNumber
fields.description: Position of the season within an ordered group of seasons.
